stage1.title: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Pyre Plains (I)
stage1.description: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Natlan: Basin of Unnumbered Flames, Tequemecan Valley, Coatepec Mountain, and Toyac Springs.
